author: Dongke (Shenzhen) Industrial Development Co.,Ltd.
description: Discover Dongke Company, a leading manufacturer of medical face shields with a daily production capacity of 1 million units. We're a trusted supplier to Top 500 enterprises and the Hong Kong government. Our D.K anti-fog face shields have passed SGS tests, ensuring quality. Committed to ethical standards, we follow the ETI Base Code to eliminate modern slavery and human trafficking in our supply chain. Join us in ensuring safer production and a better quality of life worldwide.
keywords: Medical Face Shields, Manufacturing Capability, Skilled Staff, Automatic Assembly Lines, Quality Assurance, ISO Process, Top 500 Enterprises, Supplier, Ethical Trading Initiative, Labor Standards, Modern Slavery, Human Trafficking, PPE Manufacturer, Safety, SGS Certified, Compliance, Ethical Standards, Supply Chain, Zero Tolerance Policy, Compliance Procedure
